017package org.spongepowered.configurate.util;
018
019import com.google.common.collect.AbstractIterator;
020import com.google.common.collect.Iterators;
021import org.checkerframework.checker.nullness.qual.NonNull;
022import org.spongepowered.configurate.ConfigurationNode;
023import org.spongepowered.configurate.ScopedConfigurationNode;
024import org.spongepowered.configurate.transformation.NodePath;
025
026import java.util.ArrayDeque;
027import java.util.Collections;
028import java.util.Deque;
029import java.util.Iterator;
030import java.util.Objects;
031import java.util.Queue;
032import java.util.function.BiConsumer;
033
034/**
035 * Represents a method for "walking" or traversing a {@link ConfigurationNode configuration} structure.
036 *
037 * @deprecated Use ScopedConfigurationNode#visit(ConfigurationVisitor) instead
038 */
039@Deprecated
040public abstract class ConfigurationNodeWalker {
041
042    /**
043     * A {@link ConfigurationNodeWalker} that implements a breadth-first traversal over the configuration.
044     *
045     * <p>See <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Breadth-first_search">here</a> for more
046     * info.
047     */
048    public static final ConfigurationNodeWalker BREADTH_FIRST = new ConfigurationNodeWalker() {
049        @NonNull
050        @Override
051        public <T extends ScopedConfigurationNode<T>> Iterator<VisitedNode<T>> walkWithPath(@NonNull T start) {
052            return new BreadthFirstIterator<>(start);
053        }
054    };
055
056    /**
057     * A {@link ConfigurationNodeWalker} that implements a depth-first pre-order traversal over the configuration.
058     *
059     * <p>See <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Depth-first_search">here</a> for more
060     * info.
061     */
062    public static final ConfigurationNodeWalker DEPTH_FIRST_PRE_ORDER = new ConfigurationNodeWalker() {
063        @NonNull
064        @Override
065        public <T extends ScopedConfigurationNode<T>> Iterator<VisitedNode<T>> walkWithPath(@NonNull T start) {
066            return new DepthFirstPreOrderIterator<>(start);
067        }
068    };
069
070    /**
071     * A {@link ConfigurationNodeWalker} that implements a depth-first post-order traversal over the configuration.
072     *
073     * <p>See <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Depth-first_search">here</a> for more
074     * info.
075     */
076    public static final ConfigurationNodeWalker DEPTH_FIRST_POST_ORDER = new ConfigurationNodeWalker() {
077        @NonNull
078        @Override
079        public <T extends ScopedConfigurationNode<T>> Iterator<VisitedNode<T>> walkWithPath(@NonNull T start) {
080            return new DepthFirstPostOrderIterator<>(start);
081        }
082    };
083
084    /**
085     * Returns an iterator which will iterate over all paths and nodes in the configuration, in the order defined by the
086     * walker.
087     *
088     * @param start The node to start at
089     * @param <T>   The node type
090     * @return An iterator of {@link VisitedNode}s
091     */
092    @NonNull
093    public abstract <T extends ScopedConfigurationNode<T>> Iterator<VisitedNode<T>> walkWithPath(@NonNull T start);
094
095
096    /**
097     * Returns an iterator which will iterate over all nodes in the configuration, in the order defined by the walker.
098     *
099     * @param start The node to start at
100     * @param <T>   The node type
101     * @return An iterator of {@link ConfigurationNode}s
102     */
103    @NonNull
104    public <T extends ScopedConfigurationNode<T>> Iterator<T> walk(@NonNull T start) {
105        return Iterators.transform(walkWithPath(start), VisitedNode::getNode);
106    }
107
108    /**
109     * Walks the configuration, and calls the {@code consumer} for each path and node visited, in the order defined by
110     * the walker.
111     *
112     * @param start    The node to start at
113     * @param consumer The consumer to accept the visited nodes
114     * @param <T>      The node type
115     */
116    public <T extends ScopedConfigurationNode<T>> void walk(@NonNull T start, @NonNull BiConsumer<? super NodePath, ? super T> consumer) {
117        Iterator<VisitedNode<T>> it = walkWithPath(start);
118        while (it.hasNext()) {
119            VisitedNode<T> next = it.next();
120            consumer.accept(next.getPath(), next.getNode());
121        }
122    }
123
124    /**
125     * Encapsulates a given {@link ConfigurationNode node} visited during a traversal.
126     *
127     * @param <T> The node type
128     */
129    public interface VisitedNode<T extends ConfigurationNode> {
130
131        /**
132         * Gets the node that was visited.
133         *
134         * @return The visited node
135         */
136        @NonNull
137        T getNode();
138
139        /**
140         * Gets the path of the node that was visited.
141         *
142         * <p>Equivalent to calling {@link ConfigurationNode#getPath()} - except
143         * this method is likely to be more more efficient.</p>
144         *
145         * @return The path of the visited node
146         */
147        @NonNull
148        NodePath getPath();
149
150    }
151
152
153    private static <T extends ScopedConfigurationNode<T>> Iterator<VisitedNodeImpl<T>> getChildren(VisitedNodeImpl<T> from) {
154        T node = from.getNode();
155        if (node.isList()) {
156            return Iterators.transform(node.getChildrenList().iterator(), child -> {
157                Objects.requireNonNull(child);
158
159                return new VisitedNodeImpl<>(from.getPath().withAppendedChild(child.getKey()), child);
160            });
161        } else if (node.isMap()) {
162            return Iterators.transform(node.getChildrenMap().entrySet().iterator(), child -> {
163                Objects.requireNonNull(child);
164
165                return new VisitedNodeImpl<>(from.getPath().withAppendedChild(child.getKey()), child.getValue());
166            });
167        } else {
168            return Collections.emptyIterator();
169        }
170    }
171
172    private static final class BreadthFirstIterator<N extends ScopedConfigurationNode<N>> implements Iterator<VisitedNode<N>> {
173        private final Queue<VisitedNodeImpl<N>> queue = new ArrayDeque<>();
174
175        BreadthFirstIterator(N root) {
176            this.queue.add(new VisitedNodeImpl<>(root.getPath(), root));
177        }
178
179        @Override
180        public boolean hasNext() {
181            return !this.queue.isEmpty();
182        }
183
184        @Override
185        public VisitedNode<N> next() {
186            VisitedNodeImpl<N> current = this.queue.remove();
187            Iterators.addAll(this.queue, getChildren(current));
188            return current;
189        }
190    }
191
192    private static final class DepthFirstPreOrderIterator<N extends ScopedConfigurationNode<N>> implements Iterator<VisitedNode<N>> {
193        private final Deque<Iterator<VisitedNodeImpl<N>>> stack = new ArrayDeque<>();
194
195        DepthFirstPreOrderIterator(N root) {
196            this.stack.push(Iterators.singletonIterator(new VisitedNodeImpl<>(root.getPath(), root)));
197        }
198
199        @Override
200        public boolean hasNext() {
201            return !this.stack.isEmpty();
202        }
203
204        @Override
205        public VisitedNode<N> next() {
206            Iterator<VisitedNodeImpl<N>> iterator = this.stack.getLast();
207            VisitedNodeImpl<N> result = iterator.next();
208            if (!iterator.hasNext()) {
209                this.stack.removeLast();
210            }
211            Iterator<VisitedNodeImpl<N>> childIterator = getChildren(result);
212            if (childIterator.hasNext()) {
213                this.stack.addLast(childIterator);
214            }
215            return result;
216        }
217    }
218
219    private static final class DepthFirstPostOrderIterator<N extends ScopedConfigurationNode<N>> extends AbstractIterator<VisitedNode<N>> {
220        private final ArrayDeque<NodeAndChildren> stack = new ArrayDeque<>();
221
222        DepthFirstPostOrderIterator(N root) {
223            this.stack.addLast(new NodeAndChildren(null, Iterators.singletonIterator(new VisitedNodeImpl<>(root.getPath(), root))));
224        }
225
226        @Override
227        protected VisitedNode<N> computeNext() {
228            while (!this.stack.isEmpty()) {
229                NodeAndChildren tail = this.stack.getLast();
230                if (tail.children.hasNext()) {
231                    VisitedNodeImpl<N> child = tail.children.next();
232                    this.stack.addLast(new NodeAndChildren(child, getChildren(child)));
233                } else {
234                    this.stack.removeLast();
235                    if (tail.node != null) {
236                        return tail.node;
237                    }
238                }
239            }
240            return endOfData();
241        }
242
243        private final class NodeAndChildren {
244            final VisitedNodeImpl<N> node;
245            final Iterator<VisitedNodeImpl<N>> children;
246
247            NodeAndChildren(VisitedNodeImpl<N> node, Iterator<VisitedNodeImpl<N>> children) {
248                this.node = node;
249                this.children = children;
250            }
251        }
252    }
253
254    private static final class VisitedNodeImpl<N extends ScopedConfigurationNode<N>> implements VisitedNode<N> {
255        private final NodePath path;
256        private final N node;
257
258        VisitedNodeImpl(NodePath path, N node) {
259            this.path = path;
260            this.node = node;
261        }
262
263        @NonNull
264        public N getNode() {
265            return this.node;
266        }
267
268        @NonNull
269        @Override
270        public NodePath getPath() {
271            return path;
272        }
273    }
274
275}
